item.title: Public path not signposted, path not maintained, 9th February
item.description:
The public footpath leading from Gables Farm to Badgeworth Lane is not signposted nor has it been maintained. Instead you have to use the tarmac road that leads from the farm to join Badgeworth Lane lower down. There is no style or gate to get from the field where the public footpath ends onto Badgeworth Lane. My photo shows where a style/gate should be.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Lane, Badgeworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
